Notes: Other driver's full name - Required if license plate not provided (lenient validation)
Other driver's contact number (UK format: 07700 900000)
Other driver's email address - UNMAPPED (missing column in incident_other_vehicles)
UK driving license number (max 16 chars) - UNMAPPED (missing column in incident_other_vehicles)
UK license plate (max 8 chars, uppercase) - Required if driver name not provided; triggers DVLA lookup
Vehicle make from DVLA API response - Displayed after successful lookup
Vehicle model from DVLA API response - Displayed after successful lookup
Vehicle colour from DVLA API response - Displayed after successful lookup
Year of manufacture from DVLA API response - Displayed after successful lookup
Fuel type from DVLA API response - UNMAPPED (missing column in incident_other_vehicles)
MOT status from DVLA (Valid/Invalid/Expired) with badge styling - UNMAPPED (missing column)
MOT expiry date from DVLA - Triggers warning if expired - UNMAPPED (missing column)
Tax status from DVLA (Taxed/Untaxed) with badge styling - UNMAPPED (missing column)
Tax due date from DVLA - Triggers warning if expired - UNMAPPED (missing column)
Insurance status (BETA - not available from DVLA API) - UNMAPPED
Other driver's insurance company (e.g., Aviva, Direct Line) - Recommended field
Other driver's insurance policy number - Recommended field
Policy holder name (may differ from driver) - Recommended field
Policy cover type (Comprehensive, Third Party Fire & Theft, Third Party Only, Unknown) - Recommended
Checkbox: No visible damage to other vehicle - Disables textarea when checked - UNMAPPED (missing column)
Damage description (max 1000 chars, min 5 required) - Required unless no_visible_damage is checked
Complete DVLA vehicle data object stored in localStorage - Contains all DVLA fields for restoration
Array of warning objects (expired MOT, expired tax, insurance unavailable) - Displayed in warnings-container
Array of additional vehicles (vehicle 3, 4, 5+) stored in sessionStorage - For multi-vehicle incidents
